version_description:
- NEW: Texts are now automatically playing one after another, from top to bottom
- NEW: You can replace and remove media by tapping directly on the video preview
- NEW: We added 5 gorgeous templates and 5 new text styles
- We greatly improved the saving experience: less crashes, and saving is way faster!
- When you re-use a story as a new template, it is automatically added to a category called "My Templates" on your home screen
- Add magnetism for all borders
- We added a new script font: Nickainley
- The home screen displays correctly on iPads and iPhone SE
- We fixed a bug related to moving media: your changes were not kept when saving a story, now they are

You can find us on Instagram: @mojo.video

- NEW: text styles are now grouped into meaningful categories. It's easier to pick a style that suits your need!
- NEW: you can now add several media to any template
- NEW: medias you added are kept when you switch template, feel free to try out other templates
- NEW: We added 2 templates and 2 new text styles
- The home screen is now smoother and faster for all devices
- We improved timings for videos
- We fixed graphic and memory issues

You can find us on Instagram: @mojo.video

- NEW: Export to Square Format - for Pro users.
- NEW: Slider to adjust text size with precision.
- NEW: We added 1 template and 2 new text styles
- We fixed a few crashes and graphic issues

You can find us on Instagram - @mojo.video

- NEW: Add media to mojo from Files, iCloud, Dropbox and Google Drive
- We fixed audio that was missing for videos
- We added 3 new text styles

You can find us on Instagram - @mojo.video

- NEW: Add and Animate your own Logo - for Pro users
- NEW: Set the duration for your stories
- NEW: Edit the background color. We also added some lighter and darker shades to the color palette
- We rearranged some templates into new categories that are easier to understand
- We added outro animations for some templates
- We added 3 new templates
- A confirmation popup appears when you delete one of your templates, no more deletion by accident!

You can find us on Instagram - @mojo.video

- We improved the experience when editing media
- We added 2 templates and 4 text styles
- We fixed some graphic issues related to logos

You can find us on Instagram - @mojo.video

- We improved the experience when editing media
- We added 2 templates and 2 text styles
- We fixed some graphic issues related to logos

You can find us on Instagram - @mojo.video

- We improved the experience when editing media
- [NEW] We added 2 templates and 2 text styles
- We fixed the duration for stories with several videos
- Logos are now persistent when you re-use a story as a template
- We fixed some graphic issues regarding logos

You can find us on Instagram - @mojo.video

- [NEW] Pinch to scale and rotate texts
- [NEW] Double tap on medias and texts to replace content
- [NEW] Fullscreen mode for "My Stories" - tap on any story to watch it in fullscreen!
- [NEW] Chat bubble text style and template

Find us on Instagram! - @mojo.video

- [NEW] Cinema templates category
- [NEW] Sports templates category
- [NEW] Export to Landscape format - for mojo Pro users
- [NEW] Edit duration of texts effects
- New templates for Photography and Fashion categories
- Categories that have new templates are now highlighted with a purple dot. No more time spent searching for the new templates!

Find us on Instagram! - @mojo.video

- We've fixed a crash on iPad
- [NEW] Cinema templates category
- [NEW] Sports templates category
- [NEW] Export to Landscape format - for mojo Pro users
- [NEW] Edit duration of texts effects
- New templates for Photography and Fashion categories
- Categories that have new templates are now highlighted with a purple dot. No more time spent searching for the new templates!

Find us on Instagram! - @mojo.video

- [NEW] Mute the sound for your videos
- [NEW] Change the fitting for your media
- [NEW] Social media text styles
- [NEW] We added a list of the medias you selected in the media picker. You can now easily check and reorder them.
- We added new templates and text styles

Find us on Instagram! - @mojo.video

- [NEW] Add your own colors
- [NEW] Pinch to scale medias
- [NEW] 4:5 format for Instagram posts - for Pro users
- We increased the maximum duration for your stories to 30 seconds
- We added new templates and text styles

Find us on Instagram! - @mojo.video

- [NEW] Add your own colors
- [NEW] Pinch to scale medias
- [NEW] 4:5 format for Instagram posts - for Pro users
- We increased the maximum duration for your stories to 30 seconds
- We added new templates and text styles

Find us on Instagram! - @mojo.video

- [NEW] Add your own colors
- [NEW] Pinch to scale medias
- [NEW] 4:5 format for Instagram posts - for Pro users
- We increased the maximum duration for your stories to 30 seconds
- We added new templates and text styles

- [NEW] Add your own colors
- [NEW] Pinch to scale medias
- [NEW] 4:5 format for Instagram posts - for Pro users

- [NEW] Add your own colors
- [NEW] Pinch to scale medias
- [NEW] 4:5 format for Instagram posts - for Pro users
- We increased the maximum duration for your stories to 30 seconds
- We added new templates and text styles

Find us on Instagram! - @mojo.video

- Fix crash in My Templates tab
- Improve quality when exporting a story with video media
- Other bug fixes

Find us on Instagram! - @mojo.video

- [NEW] Multi-pages stories - you can now create several stories at once, and you can even save them as a single video if you'd like to
- We improved the overall experience on iPad
- We added new templates and text styles

Find us on Instagram! - @mojo.video

- [NEW] You can now re-edit stories that you have already saved. Just tap on "edit" when browsing stories in the tab "my stories".
- [NEW] "Badge" text styles
- We added gorgeous fonts for Arabic and Cyrillic
- We made it easier to deselect a media in the media picker
- Your draft stories are now automatically saved in the background. For now on, you won't lose any work when the app gets killed
- We added a new template

Find us on Instagram! - @mojo.video

- [NEW] We added 50 music tracks
- [NEW] Typography templates - turn your words into gorgeous visual compositions
- We also added glitch and minimal templates - make sure to check the "New" section

Find us on Instagram: @mojo.video

- [NEW] You can now re-edit stories that you have already saved. Just tap on "edit" when browsing stories in the tab "my stories".
- [NEW] "Badge" text styles
- We added gorgeous fonts for Arabic and Cyrillic
- We made it easier to deselect a media in the media picker
- Your draft stories are now automatically saved in the background. For now on, you won't lose any work when the app gets killed
- We added a new template

Find us on Instagram! - @mojo.video

- [NEW] Music tracks! We added awesome 15 soundtracks that can use for your stories.
- New "Digital" templates category

- We fixed some issues that were happening when saving stories

Find us on Instagram! - @mojo.video

- [NEW] Trim Videos! You can now pick the exact video frames that are displayed in your stories
- [NEW] Edit Text Timings - Choose when texts appear and disappear from the screen. You can also set the "auto" mode to let mojo handle it for you
- We made animations go faster for long texts, to add more visual punch to your stories
- New "Sound On" text style

Find us on Instagram! - @mojo.video

- [NEW] Add Music from your Cloud Files - Dropbox, iCloud, Google Drive, Box, etc.
- [NEW] We added 8 new gorgeous templates - check for the purple dot to spot the categories that have new templates!

Find us on Instagram! - @mojo.video

- [NEW] Add Music from your Cloud Files - Dropbox, iCloud, Google Drive, Box, etc.
- [NEW] We added 8 new gorgeous templates - check for the purple dot to spot the categories that have new templates!

Find us on Instagram! - @mojo.video

- [NEW] HEX Colors - you can now add a custom color from using a HEX code. For the aesthetes that would like to stay perfectly on brand
- The page count is now displayed in "my stories" for multi-page stories
- All pages of multi-pages are now saved in the tab "my stories", no more confusion!
- We added 1 new template

Find us on Instagram! - @mojo.video

- [NEW] Trim Music - When you add a music from your Cloud Files, you can now choose which part of the part will be used for your story
- [NEW] "Mirror" Templates Category
- We added 2 more templates
- We fixed some issues related to text timings and media fitting

Find us on Instagram! - @mojo.video

- Edit zoom for Images - you can now change the zoom effect that is applied to images, or even remove it if you prefer static compositions
- We added some music tracks

Find us on Instagram! - @mojo.video

- We fixed Chinese characters!
- Edit zoom for Images - you can now change the zoom effect that is applied to images, or even remove it if you prefer static compositions
- We added some music tracks

Find us on Instagram! - @mojo.video

- Edit zoom for Images - you can now change the zoom effect that is applied to images, or even remove it if you prefer static compositions
- We added some music tracks

Find us on Instagram! - @mojo.video

- [NEW] Music Categories - there are now 50 music tracks that you can use for your stories, sorted by mood. It should be more than easy to pick the right soundtrack for your story.

Find us on Instagram! - @mojo.video

- [NEW] We added gorgeous Chinese fonts
- [NEW] Stock Photos - Search through unlimited and free high-resolution stock photos for your stories. Powered by Unsplash.
- Logos were not properly displayed after re-editing a story or using it as a template. It is fixed now.
- We also fixed some graphic issues

Find us on Instagram! - @mojo.video

- New Templates Category: Storytelling. 7 gorgeous templates that are great for mixing texts and media
- [NEW] Music now automatically continues seamlessly from one page to the next when you create multipage stories
- [NEW] You can now edit the color of all the graphic elements composing the templates - simply tap on them to start editing
- The maximum duration for your stories is now 60 seconds. It's now aligned to Instagram's limit for video input in stories, feed and IGTV.
- We added 7 new text styles, and we improved the overall experience when editing texts

Find us on Instagram! - @mojo.video

- New Templates Category: Storytelling. 7 gorgeous templates that are great for mixing texts and media
- [NEW] Music now automatically continues seamlessly from one page to the next when you create multipage stories
- [NEW] You can now edit the color of all the graphic elements composing the templates - simply tap on them to start editing
- The maximum duration for your stories is now 60 seconds. It's now aligned to Instagram's limit for video input in stories, feed and IGTV.
- We added 7 new text styles, and we improved the overall experience when editing texts

Find us on Instagram! - @mojo.video

- We made a special "Pro" tab for mojo Pro users
- New Templates Category: Storytelling. 7 gorgeous templates that are great for mixing texts and media
- [NEW] Music now automatically continues seamlessly from one page to the next when you create multipage stories
- [NEW] You can now edit the color of all the graphic elements composing the templates - simply tap on them to start editing
- The maximum duration for your stories is now 60 seconds. It's now aligned to Instagram's limit for video input in stories, feed and IGTV.
- We added 7 new text styles, and we improved the overall experience when editing texts

Find us on Instagram! - @mojo.video

- [NEW] Duplicate stories - for mojo Pro users. It is now easier and faster to create similar stories, without risking to lose your previous edits.
- [NEW] Duplicate texts. It is very useful when you want to add several similar texts to the same story.
- We added a new template

Find us on Instagram! - @mojo.video

- [NEW] Add your own font - for mojo Pro subscribers.
- We now display a confirmation popup after hitting the "Back" button in the edit screen. No more progress lost by accident!
- Texts are now easier to rotate and move across the screen
- We added a new story template and 2 text styles

Find us on Instagram! - @mojo.video

- New Templates Category: Shop. 7 templates that are great to showcase products, promote offers and display new collections
- [NEW] Design preferences page - for mojo Pro subscribers. Easily import and manage your fonts, colors, and pick the default format for your stories. Access these preferences from the "Pro" tab
- We added 5 text styles

Find us on Instagram! - @mojo.video

[NEW] You can now add your logos directly from the design preferences page - for mojo Pro subscribers. Access these preferences from the "Pro" tab

Find us on Instagram: @mojo.video

- [NEW] Media Timeline - you can now easily add and reorder media from the preview screen. Just tap on a media to access it
- Media are better cropped using face detection
- The home screen is now smoother and faster
- We added a text style - circular progress bar. Great for encouraging viewers to keep watching!

Find us on Instagram: @mojo.video

- [NEW] Media Timeline - you can now easily add and reorder media from the preview screen. Just tap on a media to access it
- Media are better cropped using face detection
- The home screen is now smoother and faster
- We added a text style - circular progress bar. Great for encouraging viewers to keep watching!

Find us on Instagram: @mojo.video

- [NEW] You now scroll through all templates without switching category, which makes them easier to browse. Also, templates previews load faster, so you can scan through them quickly
- We added 2 new templates

Find us on Instagram: @mojo.video

- [NEW] Adaptive music duration - mojo automatically switches between different soundtrack durations to fit the length of your story! Note that you can also pick a specific duration if you need to. This works for all music tracks provided by mojo.
- We greatly improved the app performances. This should prevent mojo from occasionally crashing on some devices

Find us on Instagram: @mojo.video

- [NEW] Adaptive music duration - mojo automatically switches between different soundtrack durations to fit the length of your story! Note that you can also pick a specific duration if you need to. This works for all music tracks provided by mojo.
- We greatly improved the app performances. This should prevent mojo from occasionally crashing on some devices

Find us on Instagram: @mojo.video

- [NEW] Color Palettes - choose from elegant color combinations for your stories. You can now change all colors with a single tap.
- We added 3 new templates. You can easily find them in the first category: "New"
- We fixed an issue that would remove transparency from logos in some cases

Find us on Instagram: @mojo.video

- We added 3 new templates. You can easily find them in the first category called "New"

Find us on Instagram: @mojo.video

- We added 6 new templates. You can easily find them in the first category called "New"

- We added 1 new template
- We made some audio fixes and graphic improvements

- We added 1 new template
- We made some audio fixes and graphic improvements

Find us on Instagram: @mojo.video

- [NEW] Change Template - you can now preview and swap between all templates directly from the edit screen, while keeping the media you have already added.
- We added 2 new templates. You can easily find them in the category "New"
- We added 1 text style
- We fixed an issue that prevented from adding media to templates only composed of text

Find us on Instagram: @mojo.video

- [NEW] Stickers - High quality animated elements that you can add in your stories, and customize to your taste.
- We added 4 new text styles
- We improved the text editing experience

Find us on Instagram: @mojo.video

- [NEW] Stickers - High quality animated elements that you can add in your stories, and customize to your taste.
- We added 4 new text styles
- We improved the text editing experience

Find us on Instagram: @mojo.video

- [NEW] Undo / Redo - you can now revert or re-apply any change you've made to your edit. So it's now easy to go back to the visual state you want.
- [NEW] Background Media - you can add a media at the background of your composition. We also provide you with great-looking background videos that you can use in your stories.
- We added gorgeous hand-drawn animated stickers
- We improved the text editing experience


Find us on Instagram: @mojo.video

- [NEW] Undo / Redo - you can now revert or re-apply any change you've made to your edit. So it's now easy to go back to the visual state you want.
- [NEW] Background Media - you can add a media at the background of your composition. We also provide you with great-looking background videos that you can use in your stories.
- We added gorgeous hand-drawn animated stickers
- We improved the text editing experience


Find us on Instagram: @mojo.video

- [NEW] We added an Instagram overlay in the fullscreen preview. You can now see exactly how your story will look like on Instagram.
- [NEW] You can choose to be notified when new templates are out
- We added new animated backgrounds, a template and a text effect
- We made it easier to edit texts in your composition


Find us on Instagram: @mojo.video

- [NEW] Graphic Backgrounds - amazing animated backgrounds that match the color palette of your story.
- We reworked the editing screen to make it more simple to use. There is now a dedicated button to add elements to your composition.
- We added a new template


Find us on Instagram: @mojo.video

- [NEW] Graphic Backgrounds - amazing animated backgrounds that match the color palette of your story.
- We reworked the editing screen to make it more simple to use. There is now a dedicated button to add elements to your composition.
- We added a new template


Find us on Instagram: @mojo.video

- [NEW] Media stickers - add your own medias wherever you want, freedom!
- [NEW] GIF stickers - use awesome stickers we selected from Giphy, fun!
- We fixed some bugs
